014
015package org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.fields;
016
017import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
018import static java.lang.String.format;
019
020import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.Field;
021import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.FieldContext;
022import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.InterpolatorFactory;
023import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.TransformerRegistry;
024import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.ValueProvider;
025import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.MacroDefinition;
026import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.macros.MacroType;
027
028import java.util.Optional;
029import java.util.StringJoiner;
030
031import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
032import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
033
034public final class MacroField extends Field<String, MacroDefinition> {
035
036    private final ValueProvider valueProvider;
037    private final FieldContext context;
038
039    @VisibleForTesting
040    public static MacroField forTesting(MacroDefinition dateDefinition, ValueProvider valueProvider, FieldContext fieldContext) {
041        return new MacroField(dateDefinition, valueProvider, fieldContext, InterpolatorFactory.forTesting(), TransformerRegistry.INSTANCE);
042    }
043
044    public MacroField(final MacroDefinition macroDefinition, final ValueProvider valueProvider, final FieldContext context,
045        final InterpolatorFactory interpolatorFactory, final TransformerRegistry transformerRegistry) {
046        super(macroDefinition, interpolatorFactory, transformerRegistry);
047
048        this.valueProvider = valueProvider;
049        this.context = context;
050    }
051
052    @Override
053    public String getFieldName() {
054        return fieldDefinition.getId();
055    }
056
057    @Override
058    public String getValue() throws MojoExecutionException {
059        final Optional<String> type = fieldDefinition.getMacroType();
060        final MacroType macroType;
061
062        try {
063            if (type.isPresent()) {
064                macroType = context.getMacros().get(type.get());
065                checkState(macroType != null, "Could not locate macro '%s'", type.get());
066            } else {
067                final Optional<String> macroClassName = fieldDefinition.getMacroClass();
068                checkState(macroClassName.isPresent(), "No definition for macro '%s' found!", fieldDefinition.getId());
069                final Class<? extends MacroType> macroClass = (Class<? extends MacroType>) Class.forName(macroClassName.get());
070                macroType = macroClass.getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance();
071            }
072
073            return formatResult(macroType.getValue(fieldDefinition, valueProvider, context).orElse(null));
074
075        } catch (ReflectiveOperationException e) {
076            throw new MojoExecutionException(format("Could not instantiate '%s'", fieldDefinition), e);
077        }
078    }
079
080    @Override
081    public boolean isExposeAsProperty() {
082        return fieldDefinition.isExport();
083    }
084
085    @Override
086    public String toString() {
087        return new StringJoiner(", ", MacroField.class.getSimpleName() + "[", "]")
088            .add("valueProvider=" + valueProvider)
089            .add("context=" + context)
090            .toString();
091    }
092}
